project.name: OpenLumify: Core: Plugin: Model: Vertexium Tests
project.description: The openlumify-core-test module depends on the openlumify-model-vertexium-inmemory module, which means that the openlumify-model-vertexium-* modules cannot use any of the helpers in openlumify-core-test due to a circular dependency. This module exists to work around that circular dependency.
